Detailed Description

Class PersistDataConnProfile is used to save data connection profiles of any type (circuit switched, packet switched, or serial) to persistent memory (e.g. NVRAM or flash file system).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PersistDataConnProfile::PersistDataConnProfile (   )  [inline]
 

Member Function Documentation

DataConnProfilePtr PersistDataConnProfile::CreateDataConnProfile (   )  const
 

Returns a new data connection profile of appropriate type wrapped into a smart pointer. The returned object is initialized to the settings stored in this persist profile.

Returns:
A DataConnProfilePtr wrapping either a new data connection profile or 0 if there is not enough memory left.
